biotools.summary: An Efficient Toolkit for MiMiC-Based QM/MM Simulations. MiMiC is a highly flexible, extremely scalable multiscale modeling framework. It couples the CPMD (quantum mechanics, QM) and GROMACS (molecular mechanics, MM) codes. The code requires preparing separate input files for the two programs with a selection

bioschemas.name: MiMiCPy
